Language: English , Russian

Version : 1.0.0.4

System requirements :
Operating system : Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7
Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo at 2 GHz, or AMD Athlon 64 at 2 GHz

Video Card: 256 MB NVidia 8800 , ATI 3850
Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX

Tablet: Not required

Description:
Tim Schafer (Tim Schafer) is well known for its unpredictable , full of humor games, and Stacking is no exception. The soundtrack of this project - a bizarre combination of crumbling piano arpeggios and rapid violin tunes, which serves as a background sound for dialogue and flickering black-and- white movies. All together it's like a silent film footage from . Images of the characters fit perfectly into the original environment . Look closely, and you'll notice that the floor is made from sticks of candy and playing cards , and the railings and fences - from large pins and sticks .
Matryoshka dolls are divided into groups differing views of the external unusual and costumes. Collect each group - a single task , so you will have to closely monitor the family of magicians , a team of filmmakers, a group of ambassadors and many others. When you have the whole set , you 'll be rewarded with a charming mini- watching little pieces .
Other tests are in search of unique dolls and performing different actions with the abilities of the various characters . Everything from drawing and collage to slaps on the other dolls will not only bring you points , but also bring a lot of fun. Stacking - a unique funny world full of adventure .
